segments.text: I see the kids sneaking cookies, and it’s making me a little sad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going for it, stretching as high as he can to reach that jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting so patiently for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad that they have to sneak around like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware, and it’s making me feel even worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, but she’s just drying that plate like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a little sorry for everyone in this situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to tip, and it’s making me worry for the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just so chaotic, and it’s making me feel a little down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this is one of those moments that will be remembered, but not in a good way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m just feeling a little sad watching it all unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
